name: Microsoft Sentinel
description: Splunk SOAR connector module for integration with the Microsoft Sentinel API

login_uri.name: login_uri
login_uri.description: URI endpoint used to generate authentication tokens

subscription_id.description: The ID of the target subscription

resource_group_name.description: The name of the resource group. The name is case insensitive

client_id.description: Application (client) ID assigned to your Graph Security API app

first_run_max_incidents.description: Maximum Incidents for scheduled polling first time

start_time_scheduled_poll.description: Start Time for Schedule/Manual POLL (Use this format: 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z)

actions.description: Verifies the authentication tokens and returns token details

force_refresh.description: Remove cached authorization tokens and generate new ones.
force_refresh.name: force_refresh

actions.verbose: Validates the asset configuration by attempting some simple, read-only actions

actions.description: Callback action for the on_poll ingest functionality

artifact_count.description: Number of artifacts to generate per event

trigger_uri.description: Logic App Callback URL for this specific workflow.
trigger_uri.name: trigger_uri

actions.description: Delete the action of alert rule

actions.action: alert rule action create or update
actions.description: Creates or updates the action of alert rule.

trigger_uri.description: Logic App Callback URL for this specific workflow.
trigger_uri.name: trigger_uri

actions.description: Delete the action of alert rule

classification.description: The reason the incident was closed
classification.name: classification

classification_comment.description: Describes the reason the incident was closed

classification_reason.description: The classification reason the incident was closed with
classification_reason.name: classification_reason

first_activity.description: The time of the first activity in the incident
first_activity.name: first_activity

labels.description: List of labels relevant to this incident; is of the IncidentLabel data type

last_activity.description: The time of the last activity in the incident
last_activity.name: last_activity

owner.description: Describes a user that the incident is assigned to; is of the IncidentOwnerInfo datatype
owner.name: owner

limit.description: Maximum number of incidents to list

filter.description: Filters the results, based on a Boolean condition

actions.action: machine learning analytics settings create or update

actions.description: Queries the Sentinel Log Analytics workspace for data using KQL

query.description: Query in KQL (for example, "SecurityIncident" will retrieve the Sentinel incidents table)

timespan.description: Time Interval in ISO 8601 Duration format. For example, "P7D" for last 7 days or an interval like "2007-03-01T13:00:00Z/2008-05-11T15:30:00Z"

max_rows.description: Maximum number of rows to return in the result. Defaults to 3000
